The system automates routine tasks, streamlines communication, and provides real-time insights, meaning your team can work faster, reduce errors, and focus on what matters most.
services.melissan_itsm.why_use[1]: With seamless integration to logistics, finance, and hardware tools, Melissan adapts to your existing ecosystem and scales with your organization. The easy-to-use portal empowers both IT and non-IT staff to deliver consistent, high-quality service, while advanced reporting ensures you stay in control and fully GDPR compliant. Melissan is the smart choice for organizations looking to increase efficiency, transparency, and customer satisfaction in every aspect of their IT service management.
services.melissan_product_verification.e: Marketplace sellers face risks such as misrepresented products and fraudulent advertising. Melissan Product Validation provides a structured verification process that helps sellers minimize these risks and maintain customer trust. Our process involves ordering test products from selected suppliers, which are then sent to independent testing facilities. There, authenticity, functionality, and compliance are assessed, and detailed reports are generated. Through Melissan, sellers can easily manage test orders, view analysis results, and make decisions about product acceptance, returns, or fraud designation.

services.onsite_external_repair.short_in: Service Planet’s Onsite External Repair Service offers a centralized solution for managing onsite repairs across a broad range of IT devices, including computer equipment.
services.onsite_external_repair.slightly: Acting as your single point of contact, Service Planet handles the full management of your onsite service portfolio, even when repairs are carried out by external partners.
services.onsite_external_repair.why_use[: Managing onsite repairs across multiple vendors and devices can be complex, time-consuming, and prone to inefficiencies.
Choosing Service Planet means benefiting from a single point of contact for your entire onsite service portfolio, irrespective of device type or repair partner.
smart_home_installation.brief_intro: Consumers purchasing smart home systems require professional installation and configuration to ensure all components work together seamlessly.
smart_home_installation.extended_use_cas: Smart home technology is becoming increasingly complex, often requiring extensive network configuration, device pairing, and system integration beyond the expertise of the average consumer. Improper installation can lead to security breaches or non-functioning systems.

Our Smart Home Installation service provides complete setup of all smart home components, including network configuration, device pairing, security settings, and user training. Customers get a fully functional smart home system without any technical headaches.
outsourcing_onsite_repair_services.brief: A large webshop sells equipment from various brands. Each brand has its own service policy, which makes it administratively challenging to coordinate efficient service and ensure fast customer support. Every extra day the customer waits for a repair is one too many.
outsourcing_onsite_repair_services.exten: Managing onsite repairs for a wide range of equipment from different brands and suppliers can be extremely complex, inefficient, and time-consuming. Customers often face challenges such as identifying the correct service point for each specific device, navigating different RMA processes, tracking the status of multiple repairs with various partners, and dealing with inconsistent service quality. This leads to administrative overhead, delays, uncertainty around warranties and costs, and ultimately unnecessary downtime and frustration. There is a need for a streamlined process and a single point of contact to reduce this complexity.

Service Planet’s Onsite External Repair Service offers a complete solution by acting as your central service manager for all onsite repair needs. Through our advanced Melissan platform, we automatically match the service request with the right qualified external repair partner based on device type, location, and service agreement. Service Planet manages the entire process—from intake via the Contact Center, routing within Melissan, to the actual repair by the external partner and final completion. This minimizes the administrative burden for the customer, ensures consistent service quality, and delivers fast and efficient onsite solutions, regardless of which partner performs the repair. The customer has just one point of contact for all communication and updates, resulting in complete peace of mind and worry-free service.
rma_handling.brief_intro: Our Depot External Repairs RMA service offers an efficient and reliable solution for external repair of defective equipment. From diagnosis to replacement, we coordinate the entire process.
rma_handling.extended_use_case.problem: A company receives defective equipment from customers and needs to have it repaired or replaced externally. This process requires accurate diagnosis, fast turnaround times, and reliable service partners.
rma_handling.extended_use_case.solution: Our service ensures that the product goes to certified repair partners for expert analysis and processing. From component replacement to full refurbishment, we ensure transparency and efficient handling. Once the repair is complete, the device is returned or replaced, ensuring a smooth and reliable solution for the customer.
test_orders.brief_intro: An online marketplace seller operates in a highly competitive environment where fraudulent listings and counterfeit products are prevalent, threatening customer trust.
test_orders.extended_use_case.problem: Marketplace sellers are faced with risks of misrepresented products, counterfeiting, and falsely advertised quality. Without independent verification, they can suffer financial losses and reputational damage. A structured process is needed to assess authenticity, functionality, and compliance before products are listed for resale.
test_orders.extended_use_case.services[0: Melissan Product Validation in Melissan ITSM
test_orders.extended_use_case.solution: Through the test order process to get marketplace vendors, a reliable verification system is implemented to assess product quality and authenticity before making further decisions. This structured evaluation includes ordering the product from a selected vendor and sending it to an independent testing facility. A professional assessment is carried out where the item undergoes detailed analysis for authenticity, functionality, and compliance. Comprehensive reporting summarizes key findings and identifies discrepancies or concerns. Decision support helps the seller determine whether to accept the product, return it, or flag it for fraudulent activity. Through structured test order evaluations, marketplace vendors' risks are minimized, improving business integrity.
aboutus_4: Service Planet is a leading European partner in lifecycle management for consumer electronics, celebrating 20 years of continuous innovation. Founded in 2005 by a passionate team aiming to improve computer repairs, Service Planet has always believed in the power of open source and in-house development. Our proprietary ERP system, developed and refined internally, enables us to seamlessly bundle all our services—from installation and repair to refurbishment and recycling—into a single, efficient solution. As a “white label” service provider, we empower our clients to maintain their own brand identity while we deliver reliable, high-quality support behind the scenes.
aboutus_5: We are committed to making digital life easier and more sustainable for everyone. By extending the lifespan of devices, focusing on conscious refurbishing and recycling, and optimizing every step for efficiency, we deliver tangible benefits: higher customer satisfaction, lower costs, and a reduced environmental footprint. Our core values—innovation, quality, integrity, focus, and loyalty—drive us every day, supported by a hands-on mentality and a strong focus on safety and security. Service Planet is not just a service provider, but a trusted partner for the future.
aboutus_6: We help our customers maintain, align, and improve information and communication solutions in a connected world, with convenience and reliability for our clients and their customers at the center.
aboutus_7: COMPANY OPERATES ACROSS THE EUROPEAN UNION

history_timeline_1: Service Planet was founded in April 2005 by a team with extensive B2B and B2C experience from Dunnet ITC. Starting at Achterklooster in Rotterdam, the company quickly attracted major retailers as clients thanks to its personal approach and strong focus on customer satisfaction.
history_timeline_2: A move to Korte Stadionweg in Rotterdam South marked the beginning of internal software development and a commitment to open source technology. In-house developers created Melissan, the next-generation lifecycle management ERP system.
history_timeline_3: Service Planet relocated to Stuttgartstraat and Bristolstraat in Rotterdam, expanding to over 1,000 m² of warehouse and technical workspace and 450 m² of office space. This new facility enabled the company to grow into a professional lifecycle management business, scaling from a handful of employees to several dozen.
history_timeline_4: The company further professionalized with the introduction of new systems, such as the Cyric test tool for IT equipment and dedicated warehouse and workflow management apps. This period also saw Service Planet expand into the Benelux market.
history_timeline_5: Service Planet continued its European growth, adding Portugal and Spain to its network, followed by the UK, Sweden, Denmark, Croatia, and Serbia.
history_timeline_6: Leveraging its experience and systems, Service Planet entered the B2B market, serving resellers, MSPs, system integrators, vendors, OEMs, and resellers. The COVID-19 pandemic accelerated this shift, resulting in successful full lifecycle management solutions for business clients.
history_timeline_7: The company took its next step by partnering with HP and Ingram to launch HP Workspace ProConnect, a complete Device-as-a-Service (DaaS) offering for the business market.
history_timeline_8: Service Planet focused even more on quality, achieving an NPS score above 70 for the first time—an impressive milestone in IT services. The company also pursued ISO and TÜV certification and won an award for HP Workspace ProConnect.
